function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Significant differences in vaccination rates between foreign-and native-born populations in various countries","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled disease spread among vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Improving access to vaccination for migrant populations through targeted outreach and education","Technologies":"Mobile vaccination clinics, multilingual informational materials","People":"Immigrants, native-born populations","Owner":"Healthcare authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Low vaccination rates among immigrant groups from specific geographic regions","Impact":"Potential pockets of unvaccinated individuals leading to localized disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Tailored vaccination campaigns and education targeting specific immigrant communities","Technologies":"Community-based outreach programs, culturally sensitive communication strategies","People":"Immigrants from Central and Eastern European countries, immigrant communities","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Access issues and language barriers affecting vaccination uptake in migrant populations","Impact":"Reduced vaccination coverage and understanding of the healthcare system among certain immigrant groups","Mitigation":"Language-specific vaccination information and assistance, interpreters for healthcare interactions","Technologies":"Language interpretation services, multilingual vaccination guidance materials","People":"Immigrants with limited language proficiency","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations"}]}
